text:
@realDonaldTrump I'm sure the 2.3 mill Americans infected (and millions more to come) with COVID-19 because of your gross negligence and colossal incompetence are just bustin' their buttons over this. And the 121K you've killed thank you from the bottom of their graves.

You fucking pig.
